page.title: 12The Meetin'o'the Watters
page.content: (Cont. from page 11) a gliff.Whats cessen on?". When we gat into the lamp leet wheer aa could see him fairer,he had a flaysome leuk on his feace.He'd cum to tell us 'at oor Joesph had been droonad at the Meetin' o' the Watters.Aa daren't leuk at Muther.He teuk oot oor Joesph's gowld watch an'chain_it used to be me Fatther's_an'he laid it cannily doon afor Muther.An tyek mesel' off to the bit hemmelwe had ahint the hoose an' aa whinged an' bluthered.Aa had nae necklath,so aa daubed me een with ma pedle_runtie. He was sec a bonny lad;nobbut eyteen y'r o7d an' we fair doted on him.Yellow currls frae the croon of his head to the hole of his neck,as curly as a watter_dog.He started to wark at John Robert's nobbut a few
